definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: They have remade their plans for the summer vacation.
sentences.chinese: 他們已改訂了暑期計劃。

sentences.english: SHIRLEY GRIFFITH: Other summer reading possibilities include works of non-fiction.
sentences.chinese: 其他暑期閱讀的可能性，包括非小說類作品。

sentences.english: Nowadays, summer camp is even more specialized.
sentences.chinese: 現而今，暑期夏令營則變得更爲專向化。

sentences.english: He had taken a summer job and was unloading some sheetrock at work.
sentences.chinese: 他拿了一份暑期工被卸下部分膠紙夾板工作。

sentences.english: Our quality of life will be improved after doing part-time and summer jobs.
sentences.chinese: 做兼職或暑期工會對我們的生活水平有好處。

sentences.english: An early morning alarm gets my daughter, Morgan, up for summer school.
sentences.chinese: 一大早鬧鐘鈴響就鬧醒女兒茉苷去上暑期學校。

sentences.english: Part-time and summer jobs can broaden horizon.
sentences.chinese: 兼職及暑期工能擴闊視野。

sentences.english: I'm looking for a summer class for HSK test preparations.
sentences.chinese: 我在找一個暑期班爲HSK考試做預備。

sentences.english: About 120 postgraduate students from all over the world will participate in the summer session.
sentences.chinese: 來自世界各地的約120名研究生將選讀暑期班課程。

sentences.english: Our summer school saw 200+ students learning English intensively.
sentences.chinese: 我們的暑期班有200多名學生集中學習英語。

sentences.english: Many college students used to rush through their summer fieldwork projects.
sentences.chinese: 很多大學生過去常常對暑期實地調查作業草草了事。

sentences.english: Four sides the mountain travels the summer "the only first choice".
sentences.chinese: 四面山旅遊成暑期“唯一首選”。

sentences.english: The college runs summer courses for Chinese learners of English.
sentences.chinese: 這所學院爲學習英語的中國人開設了暑期班。

sentences.english: I took part in a summer workshop in short-story writing.
sentences.chinese: 我參加了一個短篇小說暑期寫作班。

sentences.english: Regular classes are held in France, but summer sessions are held in a different city every year.
sentences.chinese: 正規課程設在法國，每年另外選擇一城市舉辦暑期班。

sentences.english: Everything Harry had learned last year seemed to have leaked out of his head during the summer. P. 74
sentences.chinese: 哈利去年學的東西在暑期好像全都從腦袋裏漏出去了。

definition: slot within a schedule/timeslot (for a TV program, a session with a photographer etc)/range of dates in which an event is to be held (film screening, exhibition etc)
program bringing education to underdeveloped areas/to work in such a program
to join the faculty of one's alma mater upon graduation/to remain at school during vacation
